npgsql fbsql
SELECT AUD_TBL.ID AS ID, AUD_ACT_TBL.USR_NAME AS USER_NAME, AP AS ACCESS_POINT, LCYCL_CS AS LIFECYCLE_CODE, OUTC_CS AS OUTCOME_CODE, ACT_CS AS ACTION_CODE, TYP_CS AS TYPE_CODE, EVT_UTC AS EVENT_TIME, MNEMONIC AS CLASSIFICATION FROM AUD_OBJ_TBL INNER JOIN AUD_TBL ON (AUD_ID = AUD_TBL.ID) INNER JOIN AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL ON (AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.AUD_ID = AUD_TBL.ID AND IS_RQO) INNER JOIN AUD_ACT_TBL ON (AUD_ACT_ASSOC_TBL.ACT_ID = AUD_ACT_TBL.ID) INNER JOIN AUD_CD_TBL AS CLS_CD ON (CLS_CD.ID = CLS_CD_ID) WHERE AUD_TBL.EVT_UTC BETWEEN COALESCE(${from-date}, '0001-01-01')::DATE AND COALESCE(${to-date}::DATE, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND OBJ_ID = CAST(${object-id} AS VARCHAR)

sqlite
SELECT AUDIT.ID AS ID, AUDIT_ACTOR.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, AUDIT_ACTOR_ASSOC.AP AS ACCESS_POINT, AUDIT_OBJECT.LIFECYCLE AS LIFECYCLE_CODE, AUDIT.OUTCOME AS OUTCOME_CODE, AUDIT.ACTION AS ACTION_CODE, AUDIT.TYPE AS TYPE_CODE, AUDIT.EVENTTIME AS EVENT_TIME, AUDIT_CODE.CODE AS CLASSIFICATION FROM AUDIT_OBJECT INNER JOIN AUDIT ON (AUDIT_OBJECT.AUDIT_ID = AUDIT.ID) INNER JOIN AUDIT_ACTOR_ASSOC ON (AUDIT_ACTOR_ASSOC.AUDIT_ID = AUDIT.ID) INNER JOIN AUDIT_ACTOR ON (AUDIT_ACTOR.ID = AUDIT_ACTOR_ASSOC.ACTOR_ID) INNER JOIN AUDIT_CODE ON (AUDIT.CLASS = AUDIT_CODE.ID) WHERE ((eventTime - 621355968000000000) / 10000000) BETWEEN COALESCE(${from-date}, 0) AND COALESCE(${to-date}, 0xffffffffffff) AND audit_object.obj_id = ${object-id}
